backend/main.mo: Canister storing images with auto-increment IDs, supporting URL or uploaded blobs and queries for single, all, and blob-only listings.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-to-file mapping manifest documenting implemented UI and functionality with linked components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend component, hook, and style file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining OKLCH color theme and dark mode for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx with root container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app stitching together header, footer, gallery, add-image panel, and modal viewer with data loading.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright text and caffeine.ai link with responsive styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header displaying the logo, title, and subtitle with responsive layout.
frontend/src/features/a11y/focus.ts: Utility functions for managing focus, including focus trapping and restoring previous focus.
frontend/src/features/gallery/components: UI panel for adding images via URL or file upload with validation and upload progress handling.
Renders a responsive image grid with keyboard navigation and selectable image cards.
frontend/src/features/gallery/types/gall: Defines GalleryImage and converts backend Image objects to include display URLs and timestamps.
frontend/src/features/viewer/components/: Full-screen image viewer with navigation, zoom, pan, rotation, slideshow, and keyboard controls.
Dropdown menu providing rotation, fit mode toggling, and basic image info display.
Dropdown for selecting slideshow interval durations.
UI controls for zooming in, zooming out, and resetting image scale.
frontend/src/features/viewer/hooks/useIm: Hook managing image rotation and fit/actual size mode.
frontend/src/features/viewer/hooks/useSl: Hook controlling slideshow play state and interval settings.
frontend/src/features/viewer/hooks/useVi: Keyboard handler for viewer navigation, zoom, reset, and close actions with zoom-aware behavior.
frontend/src/features/viewer/hooks/useZo: Hook providing zoom, wheel zoom, mouse drag panning, and arrow-key panning logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity auth, managing login state, stored identities, and AuthClient creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching images and adding images via URL or upload using the backend actor.

frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, wrapping the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and TV-oriented font sizes.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements, feature list, and progress for an Android/TV image gallery app.
